TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandler(object sender, DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs)
public delegate void DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs ^ e);
type DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandler = delegate of obj * DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。 這個類別無法被繼承。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated>事件時的 [更新] 按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 控制項內按一下時，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制更新的記錄。 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查更新作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理常式。
建立 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandler>委派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。
[!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandlerDynamic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandlerDynamic/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventhandlerdynamiccs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandlerDynamic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandlerDynamic/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventhandlerdynamicvb.aspx#1)]
下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandler>委派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。
[!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandlerDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandlerDeclarative/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventhandlerdeclarativecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandlerDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventHandlerDeclarative/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventhandlerdeclarativevb.aspx#1)]
